title: Surrender to Temptation Part IV: Tempted to Entice
description: Passions explored leads to boundaries crossed as Surrender to Temptation continues… Surrender to Temptation, Part IVTempted to EnticeWith playboy billionaire Zachariah St. Brenton, Devon has felt more pleasure than she ever thought possible. But behind her lover’s infinite sexual appetite lies a conflicted man.Devon wants Zach to understand that she has no intention of betraying him. He thinks she should fear him, but Devon wants to go deeper and feel every intimacy that Zach has to offer—even if that means experiences that both shock and thrill her.But as Zach brings Devon further into his lifestyle, she finds herself wanting things that Zach isn’t ready—or willing—to give. Devon knows that Zach has been upfront about his limits from the beginning, but it’s hard to resist the temptation to break the rules…Includes a bonus excerpt of Lauren Jameson’s upcoming novel, Blush.More to come…Don’t miss Surrender to Temptation, Part V, available 1/29.
author: Lauren Jameson
